attributes.action: Penalize Foreign Drivers Without The Correct Headlamp Adaptors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many foreign drivers on our roads do not have the correct headlight adapters on their vehicles. Drivers should be stopped and checked on entering the UK, and fined if necessary. Points should be applied, and if reaching 12 points banned from UK roads. This happens on the continent to UK drivers so it should happen here.
